answers.answer: I got induce because i had preeclampsia , my experience was i had lot back labor,  help a lot was sitting on the brithing ball , i could do much becuse of my high blood pressure only lay or sit on the ball that it . Labor wasnts bad till they broke my water then its more pain full , i tock medicine didn't help take full amout of pain away but help relax and zone everything out

question: Tomorrow I have an appointment to get my cervix checked and to find out my inducement day.I'm 37 weeks and have to be induced due to a positive test of bacteria and having low blood pressure and being anemic.I was wondering what we're some of your mommies experience??  Ftm by the way.
title: getting induced
